author: legoDad42
title: Halloween, Thanksgiving, Christmas...Series 23's got you covered!
review:
One of THE best Collectable Minifigure Series in a long time in convenient 6-pack boxes!
Minifigure Series 23 has all the fall to winter holiday themes covered with delightful new graphics, parts, etc. and just lovely figures.

Of note, another winner from Amazon. Got 2 boxes, got ALL TWELVE figures, no duplicates. The same happened with Marvel Studios minifigures. I know it doesn't happen to all, got lucky but worth a shot ordering online.

All must gets for your City holiday dioramas and/or your Winter Villages.
Highly Recommend...

Simple subdued packaging front and back.

Nutcracker (dual faced, w/2 pearl gold swords, 2 pearl gold epaulets tassels and two 1x1 printed round tile walnuts), Doe Reindeer (dual faced, w/2 antlers, 2 printed heart cookies, printed decorated box lid), Ms. Green Dragon (dual faced, w/3 white horns, bat-wing element, and reptile tail element).

 

Wolfman (dual faced, w/printed tattered sack and wolf tail element), Snowman (single face, w/top hat, scarf, broom and 2 carrots), Knight of the Yellow Castle (dual faced, w/2 pearl gold swords, printed shield, 2 pink feather elements, printed armor, decorated toy hobby-horse w/extra red rod, and pearl gold visor).

 

Robot-Girl (dual faced, w/2 pairs silver scissors, and printed tile), Titanic Captain (single face, w/large exclusive ship element and 2 red pin/chimney stack elements), Turkey-Boy (dual faced, w/large turkey tail feathered element, turkey feather arm elements, pumpkin and 2 green 1x1 stem/flower element).


Christmas Elf (dual faced, w/exclusive printed snowglobe element and 2 printed 1x1 square stud house elements, and 2 roof elements), Little Fairy (dual faced, w/printed trans-pink fairy wing element, 2 white tiaras, printed tutu element and 2 peppermint candy canes), Popcorn-Boy (dual faced).


Highly Recommend picking up this lovely set of minifigures...all excellent!
